renderer::VBOType

renderer::VBOType Namespace Reference

Vertex buffer object target (e.g. how the vertex buffer will be threated).


Enumerations

enum  { VERTEX, INDEX, R2VB, TEXTURE }

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

Enumerator:
VERTEX  Buffer is a normal vertex buffer.
INDEX  Buffer is to be used for indexing another vertex buffer.
R2VB  Buffer will be treaded as a render target for vertex data.
TEXTURE  Buffer is used for fast texture data exchange beetween ram and vram.
